Name: Faustino
description:
Faustino is 25 years old, single, and lives with his sister in the municipality of Azacualpa, Santa Barbara.

For the past nine years, he has been cultivating cardamom on his property. Previously, he grew coffee, corn, and beans.

He is currently requesting a loan from ODEF for the amount of 10,000 Lempiras to maintain his cardamom crops.

This investment will help him achieve better harvests, and he took out the loan because he needs to tend to his crops.

His goal is to buy a piece of land.
